strong.font: Ewen-Trout Creek School District Welcome Video

Welcome to the Ewen-Trout Creek School Districtâs website! Â We hope that you find our site both useful and informative. Â Our school is a learning community that strongly believes in developing each student to their fullest potential. Â Our staff is dedicated, caring, and committed to working with families and the communities in the district to help each student experience success by providing high quality programs, welcoming classroom environments, innovative educational opportunities, and an engaging 21st Century curriculum.Â

Please feel free to contact the school at (906) 813-0620 to learn more or to schedule a visit. Â You can also follow our district on social media by clicking on the links below. Â
